entry.title: Openbox Keybind
entry.content:
openbox keybind for volume&light control

<keybind key="XF86AudioRaiseVolume">
  <action name="Execute"></p>

<pre><code><command>amixer set Master 5%+ unmute</command>
</code></pre>

<p>  </action>
</keybind>
<keybind key="XF86AudioLowerVolume">
  <action name="Execute"></p>

<pre><code><command>amixer set Master 5%- unmute</command>
</code></pre>

<p>  </action>
</keybind>
<keybind key="XF86AudioMute">
  <action name="Execute"></p>

<pre><code><command>amixer set Master toggle</command>
</code></pre>

<p>  </action>
</keybind>
<keybind key="XF86MonBrightnessUp">
  <action name="Execute"></p>

<pre><code><command>xbacklight -inc 10%</command>
</code></pre>

<p>  </action>
</keybind>
<keybind key="XF86MonBrightnessDown">
  <action name="Execute"></p>

<pre><code><command>xbacklight -dec 10%</command>
</code></pre>

<p>  </action>
</keybind>
